Name: Vehicle Beat Zombie
About the game: Beat zombies hard at three different unique map,driving three unique vehicles. Can drive three kind of vehicles. Truck -- high mobility and agile,hit and run. Armored Vehicle -- bigger firepower ,deploy auto gun to build defend line. Tank -- ranged damage ,precision strike. Multiple upgrade options Grenade -- classic weapon. Rocket -- use with skill. Firegrenade -- something burnt. Missile -- precision strike. ... and more Realistic mix arcade style driving experience, quick shoot gameplay , caution , driving safety first. Need a break ?
